subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Retief Goosen shot a four-under-par 66 to take the lead at the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational, one shot ahead of Phil Mickelson. Tiger Woods continued to struggle.
snippet: Retief Goosen shot a four-under-par 66 to take the lead at the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational, one shot ahead of Phil Mickelson. Tiger Woods continued to struggle.
